snippet: Queens College and Immaculata, the first women’s teams to play at the arena, will meet in the Maggie Dixon Classic on Sunday to commemorate the 40th anniversary of their historic game.
abstract: Harvey Araton On College Basketball column recalls the first women's college basketball game at Madison Square Garden between Queens College and Immaculata in 1975, when Immaculata beat Queens 65-61; notes teams will meet again at the Garden in Maggie Dixon Classic to commemorate the 40th anniversary of their historic game.
lead_paragraph: Queens College and Immaculata, the first women’s teams to play at the arena, will meet in the Maggie Dixon Classic on Sunday to commemorate the 40th anniversary of their historic game.

headline.print_headline: A First at the Garden Earns an Encore
headline.seo: Queens and Immaculata Played in First Women’s Basketball Game at Madison Square Garden in 1975
headline.main: A First at the Garden Earns an Encore
